Constructor Detail

PhantomKeeper.PhantomInfo

public PhantomKeeper.PhantomInfo(IveObject phantom)
Creates new instance of the PahntomInfo. It also registers given phantom in the ManagerOfSenses for passive update.

Parameters:
phantom - Phantom to be stored in this class

Sensors were changed, notify the ManagerOfSenses.

inc

public void inc()
Icreases number of references.

dec

public boolean dec()
Decreses the number of references. And unregisters the passive update if this was the last reference.

Returns:
true iff this was the last reference

dec

public boolean dec(int refCount)
Decreases the number of references. And unregisters the passive update if this was the last reference.

Parameters:
refCount - Number of references to be removed
Returns:
true iff this was the last reference

unregister

public void unregister()
Unregister this passive update.
